website_summaries.verdict: A solidly built pair of lamps that are perfect for the bedside.
pros: An elegant pair of lamps with a satin nickel finish
These smaller lamps have a small footprint and cast a decent amount of light for their size
cons: Many customers noted that the shades are of low quality and are easily damaged

customer_reviews.title: They raised the price after I returned 2 sets of these lamps for damages.
customer_reviews.text: I would give these lamps one star but I like the way they look. These lamps are very attractive but they are poor quality. The bases have a cheap plastic bottom. With our first set of lamps one of the bases was broken. With the second set, one of the bases was broken and the both lamps were crooked and one was taller than the other. The packaging was terrible which contributed to the condition. I was told that Amazon would pull these lamps off the shelf and check the packaging but I see they're back. Maybe Amazon fixed the problem. I also noticed that they raised the price.
customer_reviews.author: jmc

customer_reviews.title: Both Not 3-way, Watch out for the fumes
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these twice and the first time after a few months they started to smell there were fumes coming from it got dangerous so I threw them away. The recent order one lamp works the other is not a three-way. I am taking them to the electrician and having him put new switches in them. I love the style and size. Wouldn't get these again and don't suggest these to anyone!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fae

customer_reviews.title: Good Price but Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This company does not know how to ship these lamps or has a bad quality inspection process. I had to order a replacement set, and out of both boxes I was able to get enough good parts to make two decent lamps. Both times there was the piece, that connects the shade, bent beyond repair. Also, the shades were wrapped well but three had dirt inside that rubbed off onto the shades. Overall, the quality of the shades is very poor. You have to be very careful handling them as they are so flimsy and easily damaged. The only reason I kept them is because the base is very unique and fit my bedroom perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bedside lamps
customer_reviews.text: The lamps came very well packaged, so there was no damage to even the delicate shades. They are very attractive and look much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and arrived super fast! Very happy with the lamps - nice finish and looks very nice. The shades are nice - fabric a little loose on the shade. Very happy with these lamps and how they look.
customer_reviews.author: soundmb

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lamps but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these lamps. They were easy to put together but then I realized that the bottoms are not that great and part of what was supposed to keep them in place, was cheap plastic and broke easily. I had to rig the bottom so that they looked like they were supposed to and not give the cheap impression that the bottom gives. As long as you don't move them around too much, they are lovely and are a great accent piece for any room.
customer_reviews.author: ToriTeach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect finish for ny new bedroom look!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the lamps. They are perfect for bedroom lamps. Finished the new look for the bedroom perfectly! And what a great price point. The base design is beautiful and looks like a more "high end" product.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, I dont know what others were talking about but mine were packaged well with no breaks. People think it looks beautiful too. 3 way light bulbs not included, but when I intalled them gives off good light- easy to assemble also
customer_reviews.author: Penny S. from N.Y./FL

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps, simple and modern
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps, simple and modern. They go perfect in my modern decor living room.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Asbury

customer_reviews.title: kudos to the seller for the excellent packaging! The lamps are an excellent price for ...
customer_reviews.text: I just rec'd these lamps. First off, kudos to the seller for the excellent packaging! The lamps are an excellent price for the quality. The brushed silver finish works well for today's decorating trend. I, also love the 3 way option of lighting with these lamps. Might want to purchase the recommended bulbs when ordering the lamps. 50/100/150 wattage is needed. I'm using the lamps for a guest bedroom. The height of the lamps is perfect for reading in bed. Very satisfied with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Pixel

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money I didn't expect that highest of quality. What I really didn't expect was pen marks on one shade in several locations. Fortunately they are on the backside. So it is not worth the bother of packing up, returning and waiting for a replacement. The base is fine. Just two clicks and it was assembled. Just frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: 4Swan

customer_reviews.title: These lights looked beautiful after putting them together (which was very simple)
customer_reviews.text: These lights looked beautiful after putting them together (which was very simple). After inserting the 3 way bulbs, the switches on both lamps were defective. I could only get 2 of the 3 ways to work. Thinking it might be the bulbs, I changed them out using new bulbs and got the same results. I really loved the design of these lamps, but in the end I returned them for a full refund. I have not been able to find anything else that I like more, so I was really disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Zipps

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 3-way lamps
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 3-way lamps! One had a bad switch so went to lowes bought new switch for $3 and now both work great!
customer_reviews.author: James Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these lamps, that look more expensive than they were. They are a perfect size on the end tables by the small sofa in my sitting room. They were packaged well and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: DeeD.

customer_reviews.title: Internal arcing
customer_reviews.text: Frames are nice but the sockets on both lamps are very poor since the bulbs will often flicker when turning on or adjusting the intensity. Internal arcing is making me worry about Fire. I am trying to find replacement sockets now.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Mataya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at but that doesn't help when it ...
customer_reviews.text: One lamp stopped working after a few uses. Pretty to look at but that doesn't help when it gets dark. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: A great lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off these lamps were packed extremely well and I really like them as bedside lamps. The shades are a bit large for a smaller bedside table, but fit the lamps well. The bases are plastic with no felt on the bottom as might be expected with less-expensive lighting. They normally take a three way lamp. The satin-nickel is consistent and the lamps seems to be well made and in my opinion are quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Massart

customer_reviews.title: Not great...
customer_reviews.text: They're cute, but not very well made. The box was really beaten up and full of Styrofoam that was falling apart, which made a mess when I unpacked the lamps. The shades have little stains on them (most people wouldn't see) and the plastic under the base is cheap and ill-fitting. I'm still picking styrofoam pieces out of the lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Bekka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for the nightstands but too short for end tables. They are very nice lamps!
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful. I did not find them to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I did not find them to be of poor quality as some others have written (particularly when you consider the price.) They are the perfect size for an end table.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps - smaller size that don't take up much room on the end tables. Love the lamp shades!
customer_reviews.author: Clare G.

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete construction.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality construction. Nice shades. Arrived with one lamp of set not complete. Part of structure was missing and base was not assembled. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: They were cute and inexpensive, but the hard plastic covering under the base is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality it should have been better. The stand looked cheap, the lamp shades had creases in it, the shade would not go on straight. Had to do a lot of bending to get the shade level. Would not recommand
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Lamps
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for the Guest BR. I am very pleased with the weight, condition and the delivery of the lamps. The lamps are very sturdy and the height was just what I needed. The price seemed a little high but once I got the lamps I was glad I bought them. All the shopping around I did for lamps left me unsure for most of them were so light and flimsy that I was afraid they would fall over if bumped. These are a product that will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: High quality & sturdy. Certainly a conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning! High quality & sturdy. Certainly a conversation piece!
customer_reviews.author: Iron hand

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lamps for my bedroom. They look wonderful and work great. They arrived in good shape and were easy to install. I couldn't be happier with my purchase......my room looks like a resort getaway with the other items (linens, furniture, etc) these lamps tie it all together. I was also able to find matching curtain rod on ---Mart web site.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in mid America

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lamps, especially for the price. Nice brushed nickel look to the base, shades have a gathered material over thin paperboard so they cast a very well disbursed soft light. Great budget friendly choice for my living room, would definitely buy again, highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: BurghGal

customer_reviews.title: OK Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are OK, but on the shorter side, for some reason I thought they would be taller. Shades are on the cheap side, ones I got are not well made, but will do. They are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ladycat1691

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. The lines in the shaded were inconsistent and not appealing on one side of both shades but good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are cheaply made- socket for bulb loose. Is it cardboard? But nice and tall. Certainly a good price. I would not want it with climbing cats or running kids but it is fine for my use.
customer_reviews.author: longtime gardener

customer_reviews.title: I love the lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamp. I will probably replace the shades just one came a little bent. The lamps are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon and Angela Munsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality at a very reasonable price. Quite pleased
customer_reviews.author: Ellen T.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I really love these lamps. Only criticism is it took me a while to get the shade onto the correct angle as the top is a bit flimsy and you need to bend it to the correct shape. Really nice addition to the room though so very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamps with a good build. Quality lampshades and materials. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Midweste

customer_reviews.title: Nery nice Value
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and good value for the dollar, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: usps SUCKS.
customer_reviews.text: ANOTHER product with a delayed delivery.seems they park their trucks on fri night and don't roll again until Monday,no matter WHEN the delivery is supposed to be. the PRODUCTS and PRICES are great,but the lousy delivery service is bad.you need to switch to someone RELIABLE,like FedEx.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl lord

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps for the price
customer_reviews.text: We like the simple style of these but the bottom of the lamps are just covered with some hard plastic. We had to cut and attach felt feet so it didn't scratch up our bedroom nightstands. Otherwise, we really like these lamps and the price was really great!
customer_reviews.author: J Baldus

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far! They look great and work as expected. A little on the light side so they can slide around a little if you are not gentile when turning them on.
customer_reviews.author: MC1

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were purchase for the den where children watch TV and play. The sturdy construction holds up to the inevitable "accidental" bumps from their active play. Would recommend for style and value.
customer_reviews.author: Deke

customer_reviews.title: great set of lamps
customer_reviews.text: i didn't realize when i ordered these but they are slightly smaller than lamps i already had that look like them.
customer_reviews.author: gennie

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE BEAUTIFUL and so high end quality
customer_reviews.text: OMG! THEY ARE BEAUTIFUL and so high end quality! Looks even more beautiful in real life! I'm so glad that I bought them!!
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and great looking, I looked locally and could not find any lights as nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps look great in my master bedroom and are great quality. I love the three switch option!
customer_reviews.author: Krystynation

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived well packed and the lamps look great in my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Spinner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for some nice lamps for months and just could not find anything I liked. These are perfect! They go great in my bedroom and the cost was within my budget. They were packaged well and looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the price shades are a okay not the ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice for the price shades are a okay not the best but in general we like ,could not find just shades for the price of set
customer_reviews.author: roberta mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps, very classy. The only reason didn't give 5 stars is that the shades were two slightly different colors. Still get a lot of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: hasdar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Based on some reviews, I was concerned these might be cheap. Turns out they're just fine. I might suggest buying separate, higher quality shades. Other than that, they're fine for my teen sons' rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy shades
customer_reviews.text: Shades arrived wrinkled and creased. Look at them wrong and you'll have even more wrinkles in the pleats. Cheap shades.
customer_reviews.author: D Somer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly like our stair railings in our home. The nickel matches the rest of the hardware in our home, and they are great quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: begoldn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamps
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lamps. Works as designed. One of the bottom plastic pieces is falling off. Was hoping for higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. A.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Lamps
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a guest room and they look quite stylish. They provide plenty of light for reading. Good products - good price!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: waste of my money!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, 1 came broken and the other one broke within a couple of months. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: 4janetmarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps arrived in perfect condition and fit perfectly beside our bed. They are well put together and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: NICE LAMPS AT A GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THEM FOR A SECONDARY GUEST ROOM. FOR THE PRICE THEY ARE VERY NICE LAMPS, WOULD DEFONITELY RECOMMEND THEM.
customer_reviews.author: YOUR SMALL BUSINESS ADVISOR

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: Great bedside lamps. Look great, function well. I like the three way switch
customer_reviews.author: Blackdog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and product exactly as described. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Montijo

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect style and size for what I needed in my living room. Have received many compliments and the price was great for two lamps including the shades!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, pretty lamp set -- the metal is nice looking and quite sturdy. They throw a good light. Overall, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N.D. Casalino

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamps for the price. I was pleased with the quick delivery, would recommend for bedroom use especially for a older kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pendley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamp - very elegant and match my decor to a T. Very nice, sturdy lamps with beautiful shades.
customer_reviews.author: RandMax50

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for my Living room
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Choice for my Living room! Received lots of compliments from family & friends when they came over for holidays & parties!!! 5 Stars all the away!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Better used as nightstand lamps but still very nice. Shipping was insanely fast. Extremely satisfied with these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective, 3 way switch doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the lamps But one of the lamp is defective, it's 3-way switch doesn't work I bought 3 way bulb but no use. This is not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps put a nice finishing touch on my bedroom. They came nicely package and very quickly. A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Just the right size for our living side tables.
customer_reviews.author: S Surrett

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just the right lamps for the dark corners in my sewing room, not too big and they are 3 way!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lee Boegli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were perfect for my room. They look nice and have three settings.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Lamps are exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: Lamps look just like the picture online. The packaging was great, and the lamps work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are fashionable and look great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Had to Return Them Due to Shipping Damage
customer_reviews.text: As far as I could tell, I really liked these lamps. However, due to shipping damage, one of the lamps was bent, and couldn't be used. So, I was asked to return both. These lamps fit in perfectly with my decor, and I wasn't happy that I had to return both, but what can you do. I am now afraid to order 2 new ones. But, the one lamp that I did use for a minute, was beautiful and worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia S Davis

customer_reviews.title: great lamps - great price
customer_reviews.text: We saw similar lamps at lighting stores for 2-3 times the cost. These lamps look very nice in our family room and the three way switch makes it easy to control their brightness when you put a three way bulb in. They arrived several days sooner than we expected. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, decorative lamps of good quality. I purchased them for bedroom and definately a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Quine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Exaxtly as described arrived earlier than expected. Nothing was damaged and all parts were in the box. Great product and perfect for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love my lamps
customer_reviews.text: Love my lamps. I received them shortly after ordering, packed extremely well both in great condition. They were very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy F.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One lamp woks one lamp does not and I just bought them in December
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shades could be of a little better quality otherwise lamps are nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Philip Kowitz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic bottoms fall off
customer_reviews.text: YOu would think that with a nice looking lamp, that it would have a nice looking/fitting bottom. The hard plastic bottom fell off both of the first set of these lamps. My second set is due tomorrow, so I will see if I strike out all around. RECOMMENDATION TO PARK MADISON LIGHTING - please perform some type of quality control and please switch out the plastic bottom for a nice felt bottom that WON'T fall off. I don't even know if they work yet as I haven't even gotten that far.
customer_reviews.author: Christine DiPretore

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are much better than expected, I had searched everywhere for lamps since redoing our house after the flood and thought $100 per lamp was way to much, the price on these is excellent - the design is great, the height is just what I needed for the bedside, all around terrific value!.
customer_reviews.author: 18K Heart

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice item but why if I buy it again it's $68 and I was charged $90?
customer_reviews.author: Linda A, Allen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but shades are poorly made. One started breaking for no real reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got lamps today 3-23-15. Ordered the 3 way bulbs the website recommended, however, only one of the three settings work on both.
customer_reviews.text: 3 Way Setting Doesn't Work On Both Lamps. Even ordered the 3 way bulbs they recommended. Only one setting works. Am disabled and too exhausted to return. I buy many items from Amazon as I am disabled. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these two a perfect match to my other larger lamp I had purchased a week or two earlier.
customer_reviews.author: David Mears

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and color of the base and shade
customer_reviews.author: elaine olszewski

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the shades are a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and feel. Just be careful when moving these to a new location. The shades have a brittle plastic interior which has a tendency to crack even with a slight bump.
customer_reviews.author: DRFletch

customer_reviews.title: terrible lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps have been nothing but an annoyance. Yes, the look very nice, but something is off with the wiring and all of them (I got 4) stopped working. It hasn't even been a year, they should last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Look okay, came with defects
customer_reviews.text: These are okay for the price, but they're not great. The black plastic base on one is missing a little hook that connects to the metal base, so it hangs off a bit, and makes the lamp sit a tiny bit crookedly. On the other one, the socket for the light bulb is bent drastically to one side. It still works, and it doesn't show under the lampshade, so it's not bothering me too much. At first glance the lamps look very nice, until you notice that they both sit a little crookedly. Maybe I'll try to fix that at some point. They're a good bargain, but you get what you pay for at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Mystitat

customer_reviews.title: Great Set For The Price
customer_reviews.text: great pair of lamps for the price - the size is very nice, not tiny as most in this price range and shades are good quality too
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnna Esslinger

product_meta.title: Park Madison Lighting PMT-1801-16 26-1 2-Piece Table Lamp Set, Satin Nickel, White
product_meta.description: 26-1/4-Inch Tall 2-Piece Table Lamp Set, Satin Nickel with Soft Pleated Shades
feature_bullets: 2 piece table lamp set with soft pleated white shades; 15-Inch diameter, 26-1/4-Inch tall
UL listed, uses 150-watt 3 way bulb each or CFL26-watt bulb each; bulbs not included; Not CA compliant
